variables.label: CLF_Filter_Ok
variables.comment: True = coolant filter for fine particles is in Ok state

alarms.label: CLF_A_700307
alarms.comment: alarm that coolant filter is clogged

variables.label: F_Filter_Ok
variables.comment: True = coolant fleece filter is Ok (not empty). False = Empty -> Fault

alarms.label: F_A_700313
alarms.comment: alarm that fleece supply in coolant is empty and needs replacement

variables.label: HP_Pump_isOff
variables.comment: True = high pressure pump for coolant is turned off

variables.label: HP_Pump_Ok
variables.comment: True = high pressure pump for coolant is Ok

alarms.label: HP_A_700304
alarms.comment: alarm that coolant high pressure (HP) pump motor protection switch triggered

variables.label: LT_Level_Ok
variables.comment: True = lifting tank level supervision is ok -> No overlow. False = overlflow

variables.label: LT_Pump_Ok
variables.comment: True = lifting tank pump supervision gives positive feedback

alarms.label: LT_A_700317
alarms.comment: alarm for overflow at lifting tank of coolant

variables.label: LP_Pump_Ok
variables.comment: True = low pressure pump for coolant is Ok

variables.label: LP_Pump_On
variables.comment: True = low pressure pump for coolant  is commanded to be on

alarms.label: LP_A_700301
alarms.comment: alarm that coolant low pressure (LP) pump motor protection switch triggered

variables.label: CLT_Level_lt_Min
variables.comment: True = coolant level is below minimum -> Error

alarms.label: CLT_A_700310
alarms.comment: alarm that coolant tank fill level is below minimum

internal_causal_edges.comment: When Filter_OK=False for at least 5 seconds -> Alarm 700307 is triggered
When Fleece_Filter_Ok=False for at least 5 seconds --> Alarm 700313 is triggered
When HP_Pump_Ok=False -> Alarm 700304 is triggered
When HP_Pump_Ok=False, then HP_Pump_isOff=True, i.e. the pump is turned off to prevent damage.
When LT_Level_Ok=False -> Alarm 700317 is triggered
When LT_Level_Ok=False -> LT_Pump_Ok=False, i.e. the pump is turned off to prevent overflow.
When LP_Pump_Ok=False -> Alarm 700301 is triggered
Only if LP_Pump_Ok=True, then LP_Pump_On can be True.
When LP Pump is commanded to be on, then HP Pump is turned off.
When Level_lt_Min=True -> Alarm 700310 is triggered

variables.comment: True = coolant fleece filter is Ok (not empty). False = Empty -> Fault

variables.comment: True = high pressure pump for coolant is turned off

variables.comment: True = lifting tank level supervision is ok -> No overlow. False = overlflow

variables.comment: True = low pressure pump for coolant is Ok

variables.label: LP_Pump_On
variables.comment: True = low pressure pump for coolant  is commanded to be on

variables.label: CLT_Level_lt_Min
variables.comment: True = coolant level is below minimum -> Error

variables.label: Hyd_IsEnabled
variables.comment: True = indicates that hydraulics is enabled

variables.label: Hyd_Pressure
variables.comment: hydraulic pressure analog ACTUAL value

variables.label: Hyd_Valve_P_Up
variables.comment: True = accumulator charge valve commanded to open (until target pressure is reached again)

alarms.label: Hyd_A_700202
alarms.comment: alarm that pressure monitoring of hydraulics registered hydraulic pressure out of norm

variables.label: Hyd_Filter_Ok
variables.comment: True = hydraulic filter is Ok

alarms.label: Hyd_A_700207
alarms.comment: alarm that hydraulic filter for returning oil is clogged

variables.label: Hyd_Level_Ok
variables.comment: True = hydraulic level is Ok

alarms.label: Hyd_A_700205
alarms.comment: warning that hydraulic oil level is close to minimum

alarms.label: Hyd_A_700206
alarms.comment: alarm that hydraulic oil level is below minimum

variables.label: Hyd_Pump_isOff
variables.comment: True = hydraulic pump is off

variables.label: Hyd_Pump_Ok
variables.comment: True = motor of hydraulic pump is Ok

variables.label: Hyd_Pump_On
variables.comment: True = hydraulic pump is commanded to be on

alarms.label: Hyd_A_700208
alarms.comment: alarm that hydraulic pump motor protection switch triggered

variables.label: Hyd_Temp_lt_70
variables.comment: True = temperature of hydraulic oil below 70 degree C, False = warning for temperature

variables.label: Hyd_Temp_lt_80
variables.comment: True = temperature of hydraulic oil below 80 degree C, False = system stop

alarms.label: Hyd_A_700203
alarms.comment: warning that temperature monitoring of hydraulics registers more than 70 degree C

alarms.label: Hyd_A_700204
alarms.comment: alarm that temperature monitoring of hydraulics registers more than 80 degree C

internal_causal_edges.comment: When hydraulic pressure out of norm alarm 700202 is triggered (Hyd_A_700202=True), the pressure accumulation valve is closed in fear of leakage (Hyd_Valve_P_Up=False).
When pressure out of norm alarm 700202 is triggered (Hyd_A_700202=True), the hydraulic pump is turned off (Hyd_Pump_On=False).
When hydraulic pressure is out of normal range for at least 5 seconds -> Alarm 700202 is triggered
When hydraulic pressure falls below threshold, valve is commanded to open (Hyd_Valve_P_Up=True)
When hydraulic filter is clogged alarm 700207 is triggered (Hyd_A_700207=True), hydraulics is disabled (Hyd_IsEnabled=False).
When Hyd_Filter_Ok=False for at least 5 seconds -> Alarm 700207 is triggered
When Hyd_Filter_Ok=False for some time, the probability of Hyd_Pump_OK=False rises (pump might fail)
When hydraulic level is below minimum alarm 700206 is triggered (Hyd_A_700206=True), the hydraulic pump is turned off (Hyd_Pump_On=False).
When Hyd_Level_Ok=False -> Warning 700205 is immediately triggered
When Hyd_Level_Ok=False for at least 800ms  -> Alarm 700206 is triggered
When Hyd_Level_Ok=False for some time, the probability of Hyd_Pump_OK=False rises (pump might fail)
When Hyd_Pump_Ok=False -> Motor protection switch is triggered indicated by alarm 700208=True
If Hyd_Pump_Ok=False, then Hyd_Pump_On is turned off (Hyd_Pump_On=False) to prevent damage.
When hydraulic pump is commanded to be on (Hyd_Pump_On=True), it results in the pump being on (Hyd_Pump_isOff=False)
When hydraulic temperature is above 80 degree C alarm 700204 is triggered (Hyd_A_700204=True), hydraulics is disabled (Hyd_IsEnabled=False).
When Hyd_Temp_lt_70=False (temp >= 70°C) -> Warning 700203 is triggered
Temperature above 70 degree is reached before 80 degree (common unobserved confounder)
When Hyd_Temp_lt_80=False (temp >= 80°C) -> Alarm 700204 is triggered

variables.label: Lubr_On
variables.comment: True = lubrication is commanded to be on

variables.label: Lubr_P_Ok
variables.comment: True = pressure for central lubrication is sufficient; False = pressure needs to be built up

internal_causal_edges.comment:
When lubrication is commanded On (Lubr_On=True), pressure builds up until sufficient (Lubr_P_Ok=True).
                                When LubrOn=False, Lubr_P_Ok also changes to False.

variables.label: Lubr_On
variables.comment: True = lubrication is commanded to be on

variables.label: Lubr_P_Ok
variables.comment: True = pressure for central lubrication is sufficient; False = pressure needs to be built up

variables.label: MP_Inactive
variables.comment: True = measuring probe inactive, False=active and measuring

variables.label: MPA_InitPos
variables.comment: True = axis that carries measuring probe is in initial position = hidden

variables.label: MPA_toInitPos
variables.comment: True = axis that carries measuring probe commanded to initial position (hidden)

variables.label: MPA_toWorkPos
variables.comment: True = axis that carries measuring probe commanded to working position to measure workpieces

variables.label: MPA_WorkPos
variables.comment: True = axis that carries measuring probe is in working pos, where it can measure workpieces

alarms.label: MPA_A_701124
alarms.comment: alarm that for measuring probe did not reach end position in time

alarms.label: MPA_A_701125
alarms.comment: alarm that for measuring probe axis both endposition sensor inputs indicate true

variables.label: MPC_close
variables.comment: True = cover for measuring probe axis cover is commanded to be closed

variables.label: MPC_Closed
variables.comment: True = cover for measuring probe axis cover is closed

variables.label: MPC_isOpen
variables.comment: True = cover for measuring probe axis cover is open

variables.label: MPC_open
variables.comment: True = cover for measuring probe axis cover is commanded to be opened

internal_causal_edges.comment:
When axis is not reaching initial pos in time (MPA_InitPos=False), besides being commanded to (MPA_toInitPos=True),
                        end position not reached alarm 701124 is triggered.

When both end position sensors are triggered (MPA_WorkPos=True AND MPA_InitPos=True),
                        alarm 701125 is triggered.
When axis is in initial position (MPA_InitPos=True), cover can be commanded to close (MPC_close=True)

When axis is commanded to initial position (MPA_toInitPos=True) but does not reach it in time (MPA_InitPos=False),
                        end position not reached alarm 701124 is triggered.
When axis is commanded to initial position (MPA_toInitPos=True), it moves to initial position (MPA_InitPos=True)

When axis is not commanded to initial position (MPA_toInitPos=False),
                                it can be commanded to working position (MPA_toWorkPos=True)

When axis is commanded to working position (MPA_toWorkPos=True) but does not reach it in time (MPA_WorkPos=False),
                        end position not reached alarm 701124 is triggered.
When axis is commanded to working position (MPA_toWorkPos=True), it moves to working position (MPA_WorkPos=True)
When axis is in working position (MPA_WorkPos=True), measuring probe can be activated (MP_Inactive=False)

When axis is not reaching work pos in time (MPA_WorkPos=False), besides being commanded to (MPA_toWorkPos=True),
                        end position not reached alarm 701124 is triggered.

When both end position sensors are triggered (MPA_WorkPos=True AND MPA_InitPos=True),
                        alarm 701125 is triggered.
When cover is commanded to close (MPC_close=True), cover closes (MPC_Closed=True)

When cover is not commanded to close (MPC_close=False),
                                it can be commanded to open (MPC_open=True)
When cover is open (MPC_isOpen=True), axis can be commanded to working position (MPA_toWorkPos=True)
When cover is commanded to open (MPC_open=True), cover opens (MPC_isOpen=True)

variables.label: MP_Inactive
variables.comment: True = measuring probe inactive, False=active and measuring

variables.comment: True = axis that carries measuring probe is in initial position = hidden

variables.comment: True = axis that carries measuring probe is in working pos, where it can measure workpieces

variables.comment: True = cover for measuring probe axis cover is commanded to be closed

variables.label: M_Lifebit
variables.comment: heartbeat Bit that alternates between True and False to indicate that communication to upper systems is healthy

variables.label: M_PowerOnDuration
variables.comment: time in minutes since last normal power-up

variables.label: M_WarnActive
variables.comment: True = at least one warning is active, that does not trigger the stacklight

variables.label: M_WarnWithStacklight
variables.comment: True = at least one warning is active that triggers the stacklight

variables.label: SL_Green
variables.comment: True = stacklight indicates green (all good)

variables.label: SL_Red
variables.comment: True = stacklight indicates red (fault / stop)

variables.label: SL_Yellow
variables.comment: True = stacklight indicates yellow (notifications / warnings are present)

internal_causal_edges.comment: When an error is active, a warning with stacklight is also triggered.
A general warning can affect the yellow light state (e.g., blinking).
A warning with stacklight can affect the green light state (e.g., blinking).
A warning with stacklight can affect the red light state (e.g., blinking).
A warning with stacklight can affect the yellow light state (e.g., blinking).

variables.label: M_ErrorActive
variables.comment: True = at least one error is active

variables.label: TL_Locked
variables.comment: True = tool revolver is Locked in position

variables.label: TL_unlock
variables.comment: True = tool revolver commanded to unlock position (required for tool change)

variables.label: WC_inPos
variables.comment: True = sensor indicates that workpiece carrier is in correct position

variables.label: WCL_InitPos
variables.comment: True = lock for securing workpiece carrier is in initial position = hidden

variables.label: WCL_Locked
variables.comment: True = workpiece carrier is locked

variables.label: WCL_toInitPos
variables.comment: True = lock for securing workpiece carrier commanded to initial position (hidden)

variables.label: WCL_toWorkPos
variables.comment: True = lock for securing workpiece carrier commanded to working position, where it can lock the workpiece carrier

variables.label: WCL_Unlocked
variables.comment: True = workpiece carrier is unlocked

variables.label: WCL_WorkPos
variables.comment: True = lock for securing workpiece carrier is in working pos, where it can lock the workpiece carrier

variables.label: CBC_close
variables.comment: True = cover protecting conveyer belt with workpiece carriers in workspace is commanded to be closed

variables.label: CBC_Closed
variables.comment: True = cover protecting conveyer belt with workpiece carriers in workspace is closed

variables.label: CBC_isOpen
variables.comment: True = cover protecting conveyer belt with workpiece carriers in workspace is open

variables.label: CBC_open
variables.comment: True = cover protecting conveyer belt with workpiece carriers in workspace to be opened

internal_causal_edges.comment: When steady rest is commanded to lock (SRL_lock=True), it results in the steady rest being locked (SRL_Locked=True)
When steady rest is commanded to unlock (SRL_unlock=True), it results in the steady rest being unlocked (SRL_Unlocked=True)
When tool revolver is commanded to lock (TL_lock=True), it results in the revolver being locked (TL_Locked=True)
When tool revolver is commanded to unlock (TL_unlock=True), it prevents the lock command (TL_lock=False)
When tool revolver is commanded to unlock (TL_unlock=True), it results in the revolver being unlocked (TL_Locked=False)
When cover is commanded to close (CBC_close=True), it results in the cover being closed (CBC_Closed=True)
When cover is open (CBC_isOpen=True), workpiece carrier lock can be moved into position
When cover is commanded to open (CBC_open=True), it results in the cover being open (CBC_isOpen=True)
When workpiece carrier lock is back in initial position (WCL_InitPos=True), the cover can be commanded to close (CBC_close=True)
When lock is commanded to initial position (WCL_toInitPos=True), it moves to initial position (WCL_InitPos=True)
When lock is commanded to working position (WCL_toWorkPos=True), it moves to working position (WCL_WorkPos=True)
Only when unlocked (WCL_Unlocked=True), lock can be commanded to initial position (WCL_toInitPos=True)
When lock is in working position (WCL_WorkPos=True), carrier can be locked (WCL_Locked=True)

variables.label: SRL_unlock

variables.comment: True = sensor indicates that workpiece carrier is in correct position

variables.label: Prog_CuttingTime
variables.comment:
Tool operating time (in seconds). The operating time of the path axes excluding active rapid traverse is measured in all NC programs between NC Start and Program End/NC Reset.
                                                                The measurement is also interrupted during an active dwell time. The timer is automatically set to zero every time the control boots on default values.

variables.label: Prog_CycleTime
variables.comment: Runtime of the selected NC (sub-)program in seconds: The runtime between NC start and program end / NC reset is measured in the selected NC program. The timer is deleted when a new NC program is started.

variables.label: Prog_LineNo
variables.comment:
Line number of the current NC block (from1) in current sub-program.
                                                        0: before program start -1: not available due to error -2: not available due to DISPLOF

variables.label: Prog_Name
variables.comment: Program name of the currently active (sub-)program

variables.label: Prog_Name_LineNo
variables.comment: Joined identifier of current active sub-program and line number within subprogram in pattern: <Prog_Name>|<LineNo>

alarms.label: Prog_A_701330
alarms.comment: notification that home position is reached - continue with NC start

internal_causal_edges.comment: The current line number (Prog_LineNo) is used to construct the joined identifier (Prog_Name_LineNo)
The cycle time (Prog_CycleTime) is measured for the currently active program (Prog_Name)
The active program (Prog_Name) determines which line numbers (Prog_LineNo) are available
The active program name (Prog_Name) is used to construct the joined identifier (Prog_Name_LineNo)
Certain programs like HOME_CH1_SPF and specific lines may trigger the home position notification (Prog_A_701330)

variables.label: Prog_CuttingTime
variables.comment:
Tool operating time (in seconds). The operating time of the path axes excluding active rapid traverse is measured in all NC programs between NC Start and Program End/NC Reset.
                                                                The measurement is also interrupted during an active dwell time. The timer is automatically set to zero every time the control boots on default values.

variables.label: Prog_CycleTime
variables.comment: Runtime of the selected NC (sub-)program in seconds: The runtime between NC start and program end / NC reset is measured in the selected NC program. The timer is deleted when a new NC program is started.

variables.label: Prog_LineNo
variables.comment:
Line number of the current NC block (from1) in current sub-program.
                                                        0: before program start -1: not available due to error -2: not available due to DISPLOF

variables.label: Prog_Name
variables.comment: Program name of the currently active (sub-)program

variables.label: Prog_Name_LineNo
variables.comment: Joined identifier of current active sub-program and line number within subprogram in pattern: <Prog_Name>|<LineNo>

alarms.label: Prog_A_701330
alarms.comment: notification that home position is reached - continue with NC start

Speed of the spindle x-axis (Spd_ActSpeed_X) affects its position (Spd_ActPos_X) over time.
Speed of the spindle z-axis (Spd_ActSpeed_Z) affects its position over time (Spd_ActPos_Z).
